page.title: 12HOUSING 1
page.content: There are 3 main housing estates in our area, the oldest of which is {Dogsthorpe.}There houses were built about 35 years ago. They are mainly semi-detached, brick buildings with tiled roofs and large gardens, and originally it was a council estate although some residents have purchased their own houses. Burford is a smaller estate of detached houses. Garages are attached and gardens are neat and spacious. They were built just over ten years ago. Welland is a Development Corporation Estate with a mixture of terraced, semi- detached houses or flats. They are small and compact with little gardens but wide open play spaces, and car-free paths. The houses have central heating and residents were satisfied on the whole with shops, bus-services ,schools and play facilities.
